name: Drury Inn & Suites San Antonio Airport

reviews.text: We stayed at Drury Inn for the first time and we were impressed. Our room was a King Size, large and very clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The evening Kickback was awesome, Nachos, baked potatoes, salad, hotdogs, macaroni and cheese and etc. It was more than a snack. We will stay here again. Only complaint, I will take my own pillows.
reviews.title: Better than expected

reviews.text: Wow! We booked with discounts through the visitor center. Never would have imagined getting such a great room at the price. We had two teens with us and the free food came in so handy. We ate a real breakfast every morning before heading out. The Kickback in the evenings and the popcorn at night really filled the need for the kids. Workout room had a lot of extras that you don't find most of the time and it was open all night.
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

reviews.text: I stayed at the Drury Inn & Suites San Antonio Airport with my family for eight nights in June. The aiport shuttle service was very convenient. Liked that the parking garage was gated and that there was an Applebee's next door. I really liked the renovated lobby and breakfast area. Checked out the outdoor pool and whirlpool, but didn't get to use them. Really liked the hot breakfast and 5:30 Kickback, and the customer service was excellent. We had a two room suite, which was really nice. It had two flat screen televisions with a great selection of channels, a kitchenette with a microwave, mini refrigerator, and sink, a couch, coffee table, table with chairs, and a desk with a rolling chair and the living room was separated from the bedroom by a sliding door. The hotel is in a very convenient location and it is not that far from the San Antonio Zoo and the River Walk downtown. I will definitely consider staying here again the next time I visit San Antonio.
reviews.title: Nice establishment...

reviews.text: My flight was cancelled, and the airline rebooked me for the next day. They paid for my room at the Drury. The lobby is top notch. They had popcorn popping and an ice cream machine in addition to free hot food in the evening. However, my room seemed to be a time portal to the 1980's. It was dark with dark wood tones and a cold brick wall. The mattress was old and the bed was creaky. One bonus was that there was a bridge that connected my floor to the outdoor parking structure. That was convenient, but the structure is shared with the Holiday Inn next door and is confusing to navigate. I would not stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice new lobby, but room was dark and old. Good Parking.

reviews.text: Stayed here during a 2- day vacation to Schlitterbahn. Clean. Good breakfasts ( very bad coffee though). Great customer service.
reviews.title: Good value for money. Clean. Excellent customer service.

reviews.text: This is one of the nicest Drury Properties that I have stayed at. It is clean and freshly renovated and if not, IT LOOKS DAMN GOOD!!!!! The Kickback was awesome and the breakfast as well. It was my Shih Tzu's first hotel experience and it was a great experience. Hope to visit again soon.
reviews.title: What can I say.

reviews.text: Going to San Antonio soon/The hotel is under construction but overall very nice. rooms newly renovated. clean & fresh free meals in the evening and at breakfast. Highly recommended. Room was Non Smoking
reviews.title: Drury Inn Stay

reviews.text: If your considering a trip to San Antonio for business or pleasure, stay at the Drury Inn and Suites by the airport! They have the best staff ever. I am a difficult client because I stay here more than I stay at home, and I demand top notch service. I check in late very often and after 6 hours on the road I am ready to fall into a comfortable, clean bed and rest. I dont want the hassles you often face at check in. I can tell you that here I have been treated excellent. After hours you have Monica, in the mornings Krystle, Samora, Jenifer, Mitzi, or any number of wonderful staff. The breakfast crew is fantastic, the breakfast is fantastic, the evening kick back is a wonderful experience from free spirits and hot food, to your smiling and helpful staff.
reviews.title: The Best Staff Ever

reviews.text: Had a choice of where to stay this last time I was in San Antonio, and I chose to stay here with my whole family. Maybe not the most up to date decor, but clean and comfortable. Breakfast and Dinner buffets very nice and satisfying. Housekeeping does a great job and management very visible and helpful if needed. Will definitely stay here on my next trip.
reviews.title: 2nd great stay here!

reviews.text: I arrived a day late after having paid in full before my arrival, I did of course call a head and talk to the front desk to guarantee my room. Upon arrival I was told by the young lady at the desk that my reservation was canceled. That was troubling because like I stated above this was pre-paid. After retrieving a manager I was afforded the proper accommodations. The building itself is not the newest but the staff there does a good job staying on top of it. My room was large and well furnished. The evening social hour was nice although a mad house (but a guy like me isn’t one to turn down a free drink of two). The location is kind of tricky but a little land navigation course and you should be fine. I never really heard any noise or traffic. The shared parking ramp was fine, and my rental car was never burgled (always a plus). Over all an okay stay just was a little perturbed to have to jump through hoops to get my pre-paid room.
reviews.title: Had an overall Ok Stay

reviews.text: My suite was nice but the pillows sucked. The evening kickback was great with a huge choice of food and good drinks. Pool looked nice from my room. Staff was nice. It is a bit confusing finding your room. The price is kinda expensive.
reviews.title: A bit expensive but comfortable

reviews.text: Stay here a lot with my airline. The service is great most of the time. The front desk staff is always excellent. The only complaint I have this time is that the blanket on the beds had grease stains.
reviews.title: Airline crew

reviews.text: I have been here over a month the service is fantastic rooms are very clean staff friendly 5:30 kick back is wonderful great shuttle service anywere you need to go love this place
reviews.title: Grat location near airpirt

reviews.text: We've stayed here numerous times and always enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Excellent Drury

reviews.text: As mentioned by others, the staff is excellent which I've found typical in the Drury chain across the US. They seem to make a point of selection and training good folks.
reviews.title: First time here great front end staff & van driver.

reviews.text: Stayed 4 nights at this Drury Inn and Suites, had a very good experience. It may not be one of their newest properties, but everything was well maintained. Housekeeping was very professional and bedding etc. was of good quality. Management was visable and helpful. Will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Homey and Professional

reviews.text: My family of four stayed here for less than 12 hours. This Drury is an older property. I love the concept and service the Drury family of hotels offers with pets always welcome, evening receptions, and wonderful breakfasts. All of those amenities were at Drury standards and I would not hesitate to stay here again. Since I have stayed in other, newer, Drury properties, this one's suites are clearly smaller. (see my other reviews for those other Drury reviews)
reviews.title: Nice enough, just a little smaller than other Drury properties

reviews.text: On this stay my family was returning from our Thanksgiving holiday travels and we reserved a suite for two kids and two 25 lbs dogs. Our room was packed!! The room was clean and the linens were quality. There were no carpet tears or mold stains.
reviews.title: "This is Texas"

reviews.text: The employees were professional and helpful. Our check attendant was kind and so were the women working the morning breakfast buffet. There was an active manager presence in the morning lobby, too.
reviews.title: TOO COLD FOR COMFORT!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If flying from the airport this property is really close and offers transportation.
reviews.title: Pleaseantly Suprised

aka: Drury Inn And Suites San Antonio Airport
description: The Drury Inn & Suites puts you right in the middle of everything San Antonio has to offer. A short drive from the River Walk, Six Flags Fiesta, San Antonio Zoo and more, we’ll understand if you leave us in the afternoons… Just don’t forget to come back for our many free extras! Drury Inn & Suites offers its guests a variety of free extras – take, for example, our free hot breakfast. At Drury, “hot” means scrambled eggs, biscuits & gravy, sausage and make-your-own Belgian waffles. In the evening, join us at our 5:30 Kickback® for free hot food and cold beverages. Our rotating menu features a variety of hot foods, baked potatoes, garden salad, beer, wine, mixed drinks and more! To burn off all of those free extras, Drury has a 24-hour exercise center and a parking lot to jog around. Lastly, Drury’s free wireless Internet and free long distance calls will ensure you can keep tabs on all of your posse back home.
